title: Head Monk Devoured · Ten Pillars Emerge

scenes.description: 画面淡入,展现云雾缭绕的仙域上空,金色卷轴在空中展开,光芒闪动,背景音乐渐起。

visual.composition: Misty immortal skies with a golden scroll unfurling
visual.environment: Immortal realm sky filled with swirling clouds and golden light
visual.fx: Golden radiance and unfolding scroll effect

scenes.prompt: Xianxia opening, mist-wreathed immortal sky with a golden scroll unfurling, spiritual particles drifting, wide shot, cinematic lighting, 4K
scenes.narration: 我是云卷仙音，欢迎回来。第39集:头陀被吞·十柱现世。

scenes.description: 一声娇叱后,少妇身形滴溜溜一转,就化为一团黑色火凤向那物激射而去,三名黑瘦青年则蓦然往中间一凑,化为一道粗大银光也紧跟而去。

visual.composition: After sharp cry, woman's body spins, transforms into black fire phoenix rushes at treasure, three black thin youths suddenly merge together, transform into thick silver light also follow
visual.character_pose: Woman as phoenix, youths as silver light, rushing

scenes.prompt: After sharp cry, woman's body spins, transforms into black fire phoenix rushes at treasure, three black thin youths suddenly merge together, transform into thick silver light also follow.
scenes.narration: 一声娇叱后,少妇化为一团黑色火凤向那物激射而去,三名黑瘦青年化为银光紧跟。

scenes.description: 蓝城主不知什么原因,竟一脸踌躇的待在原地并没有出手,隐藏在高空中的韩立,目光闪动几下,也未有任何行动。

visual.composition: City Lord Lan for some reason, actually hesitating stays in place doesn't act, Han Li hiding high above, eyes flash several times, also no action
visual.character_pose: City Lord Lan hesitating, Han Li hidden watching

scenes.prompt: City Lord Lan for some reason, actually hesitating stays in place doesn't act, Han Li hiding high above, eyes flash several times, also no action.
scenes.narration: 蓝城主不知什么原因,竟一脸踌躇的待在原地并没有出手,韩立也未有任何行动。

scenes.description: 韩立此行目标很简单,就是为神血而来,其他东西再珍贵,也不会冒然出手,暴露行迹的。

visual.composition: Han Li's goal simple, just for divine blood, other things no matter how precious, won't rashly act, expose tracks
visual.environment: Sky above pool, Han Li invisible

scenes.prompt: Han Li's goal simple, just for divine blood, other things no matter how precious, won't rashly act, expose tracks.
scenes.narration: 韩立此行目标很简单,就是为神血而来,其他东西再珍贵,也不会冒然出手。

scenes.description: 少妇等妖修的动作,明显比头陀慢了一拍,头陀所化白虹眼见就要一头扎进白光之中,将落阳晶一下卷走。

visual.composition: Woman and demon cultivators' actions, clearly slower than head monk, head monk's white rainbow about to dive into white light, grab Setting Sun Crystal
visual.environment: Sky above pool, approaching light ball

scenes.prompt: Woman and demon cultivators' actions, clearly slower than head monk, head monk's white rainbow about to dive into white light, grab Setting Sun Crystal.
scenes.narration: 少妇等妖修的动作,明显比头陀慢了一拍,头陀所化白虹眼见就要扎进白光之中。

scenes.description: 就在这一刹那的工夫,异变突起,一股巨大无形吸力突然出现在了光球四周,让头陀身形一凝。

visual.composition: At this instant, sudden change, huge invisible suction suddenly appears around light ball, makes head monk's body freeze
visual.environment: Sky above pool, light ball area

scenes.prompt: At this instant, sudden change, huge invisible suction suddenly appears around light ball, makes head monk's body freeze.
scenes.narration: 就在这一刹那的工夫,异变突起,一股巨大无形吸力突然出现在光球四周。

scenes.description: 尚未等他大惊的急忙调动法力抵抗时,衣衫上又浮现几个诡异的银色符咒,随之头陀身躯一颤,就被一下吸入了沸腾的潭水中,不见了踪影。

visual.composition: Before he can shock and urgently mobilize mana to resist, clothes appear with several strange silver runes, then head monk's body trembles, instantly sucked into boiling pool water, disappears
visual.environment: Pool surface, head monk being sucked
visual.character_pose: Head monk being pulled down, silver runes on clothes
visual.fx: Silver runes, suction, disappearing into pool

scenes.prompt: Before he can shock and urgently mobilize mana to resist, clothes appear with several strange silver runes, then head monk's body trembles, instantly sucked into boiling pool water, disappears.
scenes.narration: 尚未等他大惊的急忙调动法力抵抗时,衣衫上浮现银色符咒,头陀就被吸入沸腾潭水中。

scenes.description: 只剩下光球在空中悬浮不动着,同样激射过来的少妇和那三名黑瘦青年,自然吓了一大跳,急忙一个盘旋的遁光倒射而回。

visual.composition: Only light ball left floating in air, woman and three black thin youths rushing over, naturally shocked, urgently turn and retreat backward

scenes.prompt: Only light ball left floating in air, woman and three black thin youths rushing over, naturally shocked, urgently turn and retreat backward.
scenes.narration: 只剩下光球在空中悬浮不动着,少妇和三名黑瘦青年吓了一大跳,急忙倒射而回。

scenes.description: 少妇和三名黑瘦青年一口气飞回到水潭边上,才用骇然的目光重新望向水潭,一旁的蓝城主此时却似乎看出了什么,脸色唰的一下,变得难看异常起来。

visual.composition: Woman and three black thin youths fly back to pool edge, look at pool with horrified gaze, City Lord Lan beside seems to understand something, face suddenly becomes extremely ugly
visual.character_pose: Forces horrified, City Lord Lan alarmed

scenes.prompt: Woman and three black thin youths fly back to pool edge, look at pool with horrified gaze, City Lord Lan beside seems to understand something, face suddenly becomes extremely ugly.
scenes.narration: 少妇和三名黑瘦青年飞回到水潭边上,才用骇然的目光重新望向水潭,蓝城主脸色变得难看。

scenes.description: 就在这时,又一阵轰隆隆声在水潭另一边上传来,接着竟然又是五根一般无二的黄色柱子冒了出来。

visual.composition: At this moment, another rumbling sound comes from other side of pool, then five more identical yellow pillars emerge
visual.environment: Scorching Light Pool, more pillars emerging

scenes.prompt: At this moment, another rumbling sound comes from other side of pool, then five more identical yellow pillars emerge.
scenes.narration: 就在这时,又一阵轰隆隆声在水潭另一边上传来,接着又是五根黄色柱子冒了出来。

scenes.description: 随之,仿佛雷鸣般的吼声,从水潭中开始传出,并且越来越大,越来越响,潭水和十根黄柱就在吼声中,颤抖得越发剧烈。

visual.composition: Following, thunderous roar sounds begin from pool, growing louder and louder, pool water and ten yellow pillars tremble more violently in roar
visual.fx: Thunderous roar, shaking ground, trembling pillars

scenes.prompt: Following, thunderous roar sounds begin from pool, growing louder and louder, pool water and ten yellow pillars tremble more violently in roar.
scenes.narration: 随之,仿佛雷鸣般的吼声从水潭中开始传出,潭水和十根黄柱就在吼声中颤抖得越发剧烈。

scenes.description: 蓝城主突然一转身,化为一道蓝虹直往谷口方向激射而走,几个闪动间,就消失在了浓浓的迷雾中。

visual.composition: City Lord Lan suddenly turns, transforms into blue rainbow rushes toward valley entrance direction, several flashes, disappears in thick mist
visual.character_pose: City Lord Lan fleeing as blue rainbow

scenes.prompt: City Lord Lan suddenly turns, transforms into blue rainbow rushes toward valley entrance direction, several flashes, disappears in thick mist.
scenes.narration: 蓝城主突然一转身,化为一道蓝虹直往谷口方向激射而走,几个闪动间消失在迷雾中。

scenes.description: 蓝城主这个举动,让韩立和宫装少妇均都一怔,只是韩立眉头一皱下,身形开始往高空飘荡而去。

visual.composition: City Lord Lan's action makes Han Li and palace-dressed woman both stunned, only Han Li frowns, body begins floating higher
visual.character_pose: Han Li floating higher, woman stunned

scenes.prompt: City Lord Lan's action makes Han Li and palace-dressed woman both stunned, only Han Li frowns, body begins floating higher.
scenes.narration: 蓝城主这个举动,让韩立和宫装少妇均都一怔,只是韩立眉头一皱,身形开始往高空飘荡。

scenes.description: 宫装少妇和那三名黑瘦青年互望了一眼后,还是神情凝重的没有离开原地,结果水潭中的潭水,开始极速旋转起来。

visual.composition: Palace-dressed woman and three black thin youths look at each other, still look grave and don't leave, then pool water begins rapidly rotating

scenes.prompt: Palace-dressed woman and three black thin youths look at each other, still look grave and don't leave, then pool water begins rapidly rotating.
scenes.narration: 宫装少妇和三名黑瘦青年互望了一眼后,还是神情凝重的没有离开原地,水潭开始旋转。

scenes.description: 转眼间形成了一个巨大漩涡,而与此同时,十根柱子同时从半截处往下一凹,然后再同时往上一托,一下又拔高了十几丈。

visual.composition: In a blink forms huge whirlpool, at same time, ten pillars simultaneously from middle part concave down, then together push up, suddenly grow dozens of zhang higher

scenes.prompt: In a blink forms huge whirlpool, at same time, ten pillars simultaneously from middle part concave down, then together push up, suddenly grow dozens of zhang higher.
scenes.narration: 转眼间形成了一个巨大漩涡,十根柱子同时往下一凹,然后再往上托,又拔高了十几丈。

scenes.description: 与此同时,地面开裂,泥土翻滚,两个庞然大物从水潭两边破土而出,正往高处飞去的韩立,正好向下瞅了一眼。

visual.composition: At same time, ground cracks, earth rolls, two huge things emerge from pool sides, Han Li flying higher, happens to look down
visual.character_pose: Han Li looking down, huge things emerging

scenes.prompt: At same time, ground cracks, earth rolls, two huge things emerge from pool sides, Han Li flying higher, happens to look down.
scenes.narration: 与此同时,地面开裂,泥土翻滚,两个庞然大物从水潭两边破土而出,韩立向下瞅了一眼。

scenes.description: 一看清楚两物的真面目后,韩立顿时目瞪口呆了,居高临下的他发现水潭两侧冒出的巨物,竟然是两只淡黄的巨大手掌。

visual.composition: Seeing two things clearly, Han Li stunned, from above discovers huge things emerging from pool sides are actually two pale yellow huge hands
visual.environment: Scorching Light Pool, huge hands visible

scenes.prompt: Seeing two things clearly, Han Li stunned, from above discovers huge things emerging from pool sides are actually two pale yellow huge hands.
scenes.narration: 一看清楚两物的真面目后,韩立顿时目瞪口呆了,发现水潭两侧冒出的巨物是两只巨大手掌。

scenes.description: 十根柱子只不过是手掌上的十根粗大手指而已,现在这一对手掌,正慢慢的从土里向上伸出。

visual.composition: Ten pillars are just ten thick fingers on hands, now this pair of hands slowly rising from ground

scenes.prompt: Ten pillars are just ten thick fingers on hands, now this pair of hands slowly rising from ground.
scenes.narration: 十根柱子只不过是手掌上的十根粗大手指而已,这一对手掌正慢慢的从土里向上伸出。

scenes.description: 那口三四十丈大炙光潭,不知何时潭水消失得无影无踪了,变得深邃异常,而潭底中心处异芒一闪,显露出一只两丈大的巨大眼珠。

visual.composition: That thirty to forty zhang large Scorching Light Pool, pool water disappeared completely, becomes extremely deep, pool bottom center flashes, reveals huge eye two zhang large
visual.environment: Scorching Light Pool bottom, giant eye
visual.fx: Pool water gone, giant eye glowing

scenes.prompt: That thirty to forty zhang large Scorching Light Pool, pool water disappeared completely, becomes extremely deep, pool bottom center flashes, reveals huge eye two zhang large.
scenes.narration: 那口三四十丈大炙光潭,不知何时潭水消失得无影无踪了,潭底中心处显露出一只巨大眼珠。

scenes.description: 此眼珠缓缓转动几下,放出了森然的冷光,看到此幕,韩立一个激灵,蓦然想起了灵界中的一个大名鼎鼎的种族。

visual.composition: This eye slowly turns several times, emits cold light, seeing this, Han Li shudders, suddenly remembers a famous race in spirit realm
visual.character_pose: Giant eye turning, Han Li recognizing

scenes.prompt: This eye slowly turns several times, emits cold light, seeing this, Han Li shudders, suddenly remembers a famous race in spirit realm.
scenes.narration: 此眼珠缓缓转动几下,放出了森然的冷光,看到此幕,韩立蓦然想起了灵界中的大名鼎鼎的种族。

scenes.description: 韩立面色唰的一下,有些发白了,他不加思索下,遁速一下加快了倍许,直往高空而去,只是使用了太一化清符后,实在无法飞遁得太快。

visual.composition: Han Li's face suddenly turns pale, without thinking, escape speed doubles, straight toward high sky, but after using Taiyi Huaqing Talisman, really cannot fly too fast
visual.environment: Sky above pool, Han Li fleeing

scenes.prompt: Han Li's face suddenly turns pale, without thinking, escape speed doubles, straight toward high sky, but after using Taiyi Huaqing Talisman, really cannot fly too fast.
scenes.narration: 韩立面色唰的一下,有些发白了,他不加思索下,遁速加快了倍许,直往高空而去。

scenes.description: 宫装少妇和那三名狼族的黑瘦青年,虽然还没有发现这一切,但同样察觉到了一种莫名的危险,少妇口中一声冷哼。

visual.composition: Palace-dressed woman and three wolf clan black thin youths, though haven't discovered this, also sense unknown danger, woman snorts coldly

scenes.prompt: Palace-dressed woman and three wolf clan black thin youths, though haven't discovered this, also sense unknown danger, woman snorts coldly.
scenes.narration: 宫装少妇和三名狼族的黑瘦青年,虽然还没有发现这一切,但同样察觉到莫名的危险。

scenes.description: 少妇张口一喷,一块赤红的锦帕喷出体外,再一扬手,一道丈许大青光蛟龙般射出,围绕其盘旋飞舞,竟是一口神妙异常的青色飞刀。

visual.composition: Woman opens mouth, spits red brocade handkerchief out, raises hand, zhang-sized green light dragon shoots out, circles around her, actually a magical green flying knife
visual.character_pose: Woman preparing defenses, flying knife circling
visual.fx: Red handkerchief, green flying knife, light

scenes.prompt: Woman opens mouth, spits red brocade handkerchief out, raises hand, zhang-sized green light dragon shoots out, circles around her, actually a magical green flying knife.
scenes.narration: 少妇张口一喷,一块赤红的锦帕喷出体外,再一扬手,一道丈许大青光蛟龙般射出。

scenes.description: 锦帕则滴溜溜的在头顶一转,立即化为一块红濛濛的光罩,将少妇护在了其内,那三名青年则同时两手掐诀,身上放出淡银色光芒。

visual.composition: Brocade handkerchief spins above head, immediately transforms into red light shield, protects woman inside, three youths simultaneously form seals, bodies emit pale silver light
visual.character_pose: Woman protected, youths activating silver light

scenes.prompt: Brocade handkerchief spins above head, immediately transforms into red light shield, protects woman inside, three youths simultaneously form seals, bodies emit pale silver light.
scenes.narration: 锦帕在头顶一转,立即化为红濛濛的光罩,将少妇护在其内,三名青年身上放出淡银色光芒。

scenes.description: 随之三团光芒融合一体,化为一团大银团,将三人同时淹没进了其中,方一做好防护,未等这四名高阶妖修,另行再施展什么神通。

visual.composition: Then three light masses merge into one, transform into large silver mass, submerge three people inside, just made defenses, before these four high-level demon cultivators use more abilities
visual.character_pose: Three youths merged in silver light

scenes.prompt: Then three light masses merge into one, transform into large silver mass, submerge three people inside, just made defenses, before these four high-level demon cultivators use more abilities.
scenes.narration: 随之三团光芒融合一体,化为一团大银团,将三人同时淹没进了其中,方一做好防护。

scenes.description: 画面淡出,夜色下的仙城剪影,天空洒落灵光,画面逐渐变暗。

visual.composition: Silhouette of the immortal city beneath night, spiritual light raining from the heavens
visual.environment: Night sky, city silhouette, floating light particles

scenes.prompt: Xianxia ending, immortal city silhouette under the night sky, spiritual particles drifting down, calm mysterious atmosphere, wide shot, cinematic lighting, 4K
scenes.narration: 下一集再见。我是云卷仙音,原著作者忘语。第40集即将开始。
